data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during GRAFTON cruise from Augustine Bay to Bombay started at 1758-08-29

Ship: Grafton (3rd Rate Frigate), Voyage: Augustine Bay, Madagascar - Bombay, 1st Observer: Richard Tiddeman (Captain), 2nd Observer: John Cove (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 68G 1414BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
